name: MetricCardOne
description: Metric card with large gradient value text, title, description, and icon badge.

description.example: Key metrics that showcase our growth and success

value.note: Large metric value displayed with gradient effect.

title.note: Metric label displayed below value with negative margin overlap

description.note: Supporting description text displayed below title

icon.note: Lucide icon displayed in bottom-left corner with primary-button styling

propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ id: string, value: string, title: string, description: string, icon: LucideIcon }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <MetricCardOne metrics={[{ id: '1', value: '100', title: 'million', description: 'Active users worldwide', icon: TrendingUp }, { id: '2', value: '700', title: 'thousand', description: 'Projects completed successfully', icon: Users }]} title="Our Impact" description="See how we're making a difference" gridVariant="uniform-all-items-equal" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
